{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3028757,"name":"thatoneandonlytechguy","username":"thetechguy61705","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thetechguy61705/{size}/141652_2.png","created_at":"2022-03-23T15:41:17.482Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone, I was trying to update my motor controller which is Victor SPX from the 2021 firmware, however when I try and update the firmware, or even blink the device, Phoenix Tuner says the node is invalid.

Our robot consists of one victor, two falcons (that are not hooked up) and 4 spark max’. Each have unique ID’s so I’m not sure what the issue could be. If anybody could provide some help that would be amazing!

image1634×627 71.4 KB

As I understand it, the node is the Can ID. If you can’t blink it, are you certain you are using the right can ID for that device?

Can you post a screenshot of the Phoenix showing all the devices on the bus?
